points: Leveraged Typescript, JavaScript, async programming, and React to build closed captions for an upcoming MS Teams feature to improve user experience and accessibility
Utilized feature flags and kill switches to prevent new code changes from breaking repositories used by various Microsoft 365 apps to run their video services

Led a team of 4 developers to transform an existing prototype into a production-grade web application in the span of 4 months, meant as a promotional platform to support Scarborough restaurants during this pandemic

Coded over 2000+ lines of Python and 500+ lines of Typescript to the overall codebase. Was named the 'expert of all things' and developer team lead, contributing the most in terms of backend CRUD APIs, Django admin functionalities, Angular frontend page layouts, and the deployment pipeline
Implemented, tested, and deployed a temporary data collection page within tight timeline constraints, had to learn the basics of Nginx and Docker in 2 days

Assisted in improving the project's foundational security, and migrated 10+ features over to the new codebase in less than 2 weeks; concurrently improved the implementation and documentation of several functions

Designed and engineered overall layout for the Django backend, ensuring consistency of error-handling and MongoDB operations between 7 CRUD API apps, as well as simplifying how errors are displayed on the user end
Adapted to heavier workloads and tighter deadlines within the 1st week of remote work-from-home
Built test suites and automation scripts in LeanFT C# for a new mortgage/credit API, reducing the runtime of testing (when done manually) by 70%
Debugged issues in the automation script code, averaging about a half-an-hour of troubleshooting and detailed analysis
Collaborated with tech and cross-functional teams to gather requirements and determine tech stacks for developing the health startupâ€™s platform during 2 hour weekly meetings
Acquired the basics of Django within 3 days through online tutorials to assist with building the company's platform
Researched and compared a number of scheduling software to determine which product and its API is best suited for the company's needs, settled with SimplyBook in the end
Built a Python script which batch-books patients via SimplyBook API and extracts data for EMRs
